member.name: T:xIMU_API.PacketCount
member.summary: Packet count class tracks number of packets read and written.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketCount.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketCount.#ctor(xIMU_API.PacketCount)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Existing instance of to copy.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketCount.Reset
member.summary: Resets all packet counts to zero.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketCount.Difference(xIMU_API.PacketCount)
member.summary: Returns the difference between the current and previous packet count.
member.param: Previous packet count.
member.returns: Difference between the current and previous packet count.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.PacketsReadErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of packet read errors.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.TotalPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.ErrorPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of error data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.CommandPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of command data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.RegisterDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of register data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.DateTimeDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of date/time data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.RawBattThermDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of raw battery and thermometer data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.CalBattThermDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of calibration battery and thermometer data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.RawInertialMagDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of raw inertial/magnetic data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.CalInertialMagDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of calibrated inertial/magnetic data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.QuaternionDataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of quaternion packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.DigitalIODataPacketsRead
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of digital I/O data packets read.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.TotalPacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of packets written.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.CommandPacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of command packets written.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.ReadRegisterPacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of read register packets written.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.WriteRegisterPacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of write register packets written.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.ReadDateTimePacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of read date/time packets written.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.WriteDateTimePacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of write date/time packets written.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.PacketCount.DigitalIODataPacketsWritten
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of digital I/O data packets written.

member.name: T:xIMU_API.xIMUfile
member.summary: x-IMU file class.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Opens or creates file.
member.param: Path of file.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Path of file.
Enable overwrite. true = create or overwrite file, false = create or open file.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.Close
member.summary: Closes the file.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.WriteWriteRegisterPacket(xIMU_API.RegisterData)
member.summary: Writes write register packet.
member.param: Register data containing register address and value.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.WriteByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes byte array to serial port and increments the sent packets counter.
member.param: Byte array to be sent to serial port.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.Read
member.summary: Reads file. Interpreted packets are provided in individual packet read events.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.FilePath
member.summary: Gets the file path.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.xIMUfile.PacketCounter
member.summary: Gets the packet count data object.

member.name: T:xIMU_API.PacketEncoding
member.summary: Packet encoding class. Contains static methods for packet encoding and decoding.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketEncoding.EncodePacket(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes packet with consecutive right shifts so that the msb of each encoded byte is clear. The msb of the final byte is set to indicate the end of the packet.
member.param: The decoded packet contents to be encoded.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketEncoding.RightShiftByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Right shifts a byte array by 1 bit. The lsb of byte x becomes the msb of byte x+1.
member.param: The byte array to be right shifted.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketEncoding.DecodePacket(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decodes a packet with consecutive left shifts so that the msb of each encoded byte is removed.
member.param: The endcoded packet to be decoded.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketEncoding.LeftShiftByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Left shifts a byte array by 1 bit. The msb of byte x becomes the lsb of byte x-1.
member.param: The byte array to be left shifted.

member.name: T:xIMU_API.xIMUdata
member.summary: x-IMU data class. Base class cannot be instantiated.

member.name: T:xIMU_API.RawBattThermData

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: Raw battery voltage ADC data in LSBs.
Raw Thermometer ADC data in LSBs.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.RawBattThermData.ConvertToCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.RawBattThermData.BatteryVoltage
member.summary: Raw battery voltage ADC data in LSBs.

member.name: P:xIMU_API.RawBattThermData.Thermometer
member.summary: Raw Thermometer ADC data in LSBs.

member.name: T:xIMU_API.QuaternionData
member.summary: Quaternion data class.
member.remarks: See http://www.x-io.co.uk/res/doc/quaternions.pdf for more information on quaternions.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.#ctor(System.Single[])
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: Quaternion. Must of 4 elements. Each element must be of value -1 to +1.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.Rad2Deg(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts from radians to degrees.
member.param: Angular quantity in radians.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToConjugate
member.summary: Returns the quaternion conjugate.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToRotationMatrix
member.summary: Converts data to rotation matrix.
member.remarks: Elements 0 to 2 represent columns 1 to 3 of row 1. Elements 3 to 5 represent columns 1 to 3 of row 2. Elements 6 to 8 represent columns 1 to 3 of row 3.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToEulerAngles
member.summary: Converts data to XYZ Euler angles (in degrees).

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToRotationMatrixCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables representaing the elements of a rotation matrix.
member.remarks: First to third values represent columns 1 to 3 of row 1. Forth to fifth values represent columns 1 to 3 of row 2. Sixth to eighth values represent columns 1 to 3 of row 3.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.ConvertToEulerAnglesCSV
member.summary: Converts data to string of Comma Separated Variables representaing the XYZ Euler angles (in degrees).

member.name: P:xIMU_API.QuaternionData.Quaternion
member.summary: Quaternion. Must of 4 elements. Each element must be of value -1 to +1. Vector will be normalised.

member.name: T:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction
member.summary: Packet construction class. Contains static methods for packet construction and deconstruction.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.ConstructCommandPacket(xIMU_API.CommandCodes)
member.summary: Constructs an encoded command packet.
member.param: Command code. See .

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.ConstructReadRegisterPacket(xIMU_API.RegisterData)
member.summary: Constructs a read register packet.
member.param: instance containing register address to be read.
member.returns: Constructed and encoded read register packet

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.ConstructWriteRegisterPacket(xIMU_API.RegisterData)
member.summary: Constructs a write register packet.
member.param: instance containing register address and value to be written.
member.returns: Constructed and encoded write register packet

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.ConstructReadDateTimePacket
member.summary: Constructs a read date/time packet.
member.returns: Constructed and encoded read date/time packet

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.ConstructWriteDateTimePacket(xIMU_API.DateTimeData)
member.summary: Constructs a write date/time packet.
member.param: instance containing data to be written.
member.returns: Constructed and encoded write date/time packet

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.ConstructDigitalIOPacket(xIMU_API.DigitalIOdata)
member.summary: Constructs an encoded digital I/O packet.
member.param: instance containing output states to be set.
member.returns: Constructed and encoded digital I/O packet.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.InsertChecksum(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Inserts check sum at last position in array equal to the sum all of bytes preceding it.
member.param: Decoded packet byte array.
member.returns: Decoded packet with checksum inserted at last position in array.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.DeconstructPacket(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Deconstructs packet from and encoded byte array and return data object.
member.param: Byte array containing the encoded packet.
member.exception: Thrown when deconstruction of an invalid packet is attempted.

member.name: M:xIMU_API.PacketConstruction.Combine(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Combines a most significant and least significant byte to return a short.
member.param: Most significant byte.
Least significant byte.
member.returns: MSB and LSB combined to create a short.
